snippet: Vintage valentines at the Old Print Shop; Linnaeus Tripe’s photographs of colonial Burma; and artifacts from the Pacific theater of World War II at Bonhams auction house.
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; vintage valentines are on display at the Old Print Shop in Manhattan; exhibit of Linnaeus Tripe’s photographs of colonial Burma opens at Hans P Kraus Jr Fine Photographs gallery; artifacts from World War II battles in the Pacific are up for sale at Bonhams auction house.
lead_paragraph: Vintage valentines at the Old Print Shop; Linnaeus Tripe’s photographs of colonial Burma; and artifacts from the Pacific theater of World War II at Bonhams auction house.

headline.seo: Vintage Valentines, Linnaeus Tripe Photos, War Artifacts
